inair.event

Class Event<ArgType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.event.Event<ArgType>

  • public class Event<ArgType>
extends java.lang.Object

    The base class for all event classes.

    An event is a message sent by an object to signal the occurrence of an action.

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Event(java.lang.Class<ArgType> argTypeClass)
      Constructor to make an event that can invoke all handlers with argument as ArgType when event raises

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(java.lang.Class<ArgType> argTypeClass)
        Constructor to make an event that can invoke all handlers with argument as ArgType when event raises
        Parameters:
        argTypeClass - argument type of handler method that this event can invoke see Delegate

    • Method Detail

      • addHandler

        public boolean addHandler(Delegate<? extends ArgType> handler)

        Method to add handler to this event

        This method may be throw IllegalArgumentException if handler is null or type of argument of handler method is not assignable from ArgType
        Parameters:
        handler - the delegate object with argument type is assignable from ArgType
        Returns:
        true if handler is added or false if handler has been added before

      • removeHandler

        public boolean removeHandler(Delegate<? extends ArgType> handler)

        Method to remove handler to this event

        Parameters:
        handler - the delegate object need to be removed
        Returns:
        true if remove successfully

      • removeAllHandlers

        public void removeAllHandlers()

        Method to remove all handlers current in this event

      • raise

        public void raise(java.lang.Object sender,
         ArgType argument)

        Call to raise this event that will invoke all handlers that have been added to this event

        Parameters:
        sender - object that raise this event
        argument - argument transfer to all handlers
